short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the user agent for specific domains or URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your browser’s identity with UserAgent Changer! This powerful Chrome extension allows you to modify your browser’s user agent string, enabling you to appear as if you’re using a different browser, operating system, or device. Whether you’re a developer testing website compatibility or simply want to enhance your privacy, UserAgent Changer offers a flexible and user-friendly solution.

Key Features:
	•	Customizable User Agent: Set any user agent string you desire for individual websites or entire domains.
	•	Advanced Rule Configuration: Define rules based on wildcard patterns, exact domains, or specific URLs, giving you precise control over where your custom user agent is applied.
	•	Easy On/Off Toggle: Enable or disable the extension quickly with a simple toggle switch in the popup menu.
	•	User-Friendly Interface: Clean and modern design with Bootstrap-enhanced forms and lists, making it easy to configure and manage your settings.
	•	Persistent Settings: Your settings are saved locally, so they persist across browsing sessions.
	•	Privacy Enhancement: Mask your real browser identity and protect your online privacy by customizing how websites perceive your browser.

Use Cases:
	•	Web Developers: Test how your website behaves across different browsers and devices without needing multiple physical devices.
	•	Privacy Enthusiasts: Avoid being tracked by websites by changing your user agent string to something more generic.
	•	Power Users: Customize your browsing experience by making your browser appear as a mobile device, tablet, or different browser altogether.

How It Works:
	1.	Add Custom User Agent: Open the options page and input the desired user agent string.
	2.	Set Rules: Define rules to apply the custom user agent to specific websites, domains, or URLs using wildcard patterns for more flexibility.
	3.	Toggle On/Off: Use the popup menu to quickly enable or disable the extension as needed.

Get Started Now!
Customize your browsing experience today with UserAgent Changer. Whether you’re a developer, privacy-conscious user, or just looking to personalize your web browsing, this extension is your go-to tool for managing your user agent.
